transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using an allowance.

mint.description: Mints new tokens to a specified address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that the spender can spend on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Allows the spender to withdraw a set amount of tokens from the owner's account.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender by the owner.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender by the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specific address.

grantRole.description: Grants a specific role to an account.

revokeRole.description: Revokes a specific role from an account.

hasRole.description: Checks if an account has a specific role.

getRoleMember.description: Returns the account at a specific index for a role.

getRoleMemberCount.description: Returns the number of accounts that have a specific role.

renounceRole.description: Renounces a role from the calling account.

getNonce.description: Returns the current nonce for a user, useful for meta-transactions.

getDomainSeperator.description: Returns the domain separator used in the encoding of the signature for meta-transactions.

getChainId.description: Returns the chain ID of the contract's blockchain.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.
